analysis.description:
Reentrancy in Crowdsale.sellTokens (/unique_chucks/5/0x24dc97fb4fd3517fa82943b00a60b0fd3bcf0688.sol#763-790):
	External calls:
	- tokensSold = _value * uint256(10) ** token.decimals() / tokenRateWei (/unique_chucks/5/0x24dc97fb4fd3517fa82943b00a60b0fd3bcf0688.sol#773-774)
	- token.transferByCrowdsale(_recepient,tokensSold) (/unique_chucks/5/0x24dc97fb4fd3517fa82943b00a60b0fd3bcf0688.sol#783-786)
	External calls sending eth:
	- _recepient.transfer(refund) (/unique_chucks/5/0x24dc97fb4fd3517fa82943b00a60b0fd3bcf0688.sol#771-772)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- totalCollected (/unique_chucks/5/0x24dc97fb4fd3517fa82943b00a60b0fd3bcf0688.sol#789)

BasicToken.totalSupply_ (/unique_chucks/5/0x24dc97fb4fd3517fa82943b00a60b0fd3bcf0688.sol#60-61) is never initialized. It is used in:
	- totalSupply (/unique_chucks/5/0x24dc97fb4fd3517fa82943b00a60b0fd3bcf0688.sol#63-68)

Crowdsale.refund (/unique_chucks/5/0x24dc97fb4fd3517fa82943b00a60b0fd3bcf0688.sol) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.transferFromByCrowdsale(msg.sender,token.forSale(),tokens) (/unique_chucks/5/0x24dc97fb4fd3517fa82943b00a60b0fd3bcf0688.sol)

Crowdsale.sellTokens.refund (local variable @ /unique_chucks/5/0x24dc97fb4fd3517fa82943b00a60b0fd3bcf0688.sol#770-771) shadows:
	- Crowdsale.refund (function @ /unique_chucks/5/0x24dc97fb4fd3517fa82943b00a60b0fd3bcf0688.sol)

Reentrancy in Crowdsale.sellTokens (/unique_chucks/5/0x24dc97fb4fd3517fa82943b00a60b0fd3bcf0688.sol#763-790):
	External calls:
	- tokensSold = _value * uint256(10) ** token.decimals() / tokenRateWei (/unique_chucks/5/0x24dc97fb4fd3517fa82943b00a60b0fd3bcf0688.sol#773-774)
	External calls sending eth:
	- _recepient.transfer(refund) (/unique_chucks/5/0x24dc97fb4fd3517fa82943b00a60b0fd3bcf0688.sol#771-772)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- currentBonusPeriod (/unique_chucks/5/0x24dc97fb4fd3517fa82943b00a60b0fd3bcf0688.sol#776)

Reentrancy in Crowdsale.sellTokens (/unique_chucks/5/0x24dc97fb4fd3517fa82943b00a60b0fd3bcf0688.sol#763-790):
	External calls:
	- tokensSold = _value * uint256(10) ** token.decimals() / tokenRateWei (/unique_chucks/5/0x24dc97fb4fd3517fa82943b00a60b0fd3bcf0688.sol#773-774)
	- token.transferByCrowdsale(_recepient,tokensSold) (/unique_chucks/5/0x24dc97fb4fd3517fa82943b00a60b0fd3bcf0688.sol#783-786)
	External calls sending eth:
	- _recepient.transfer(refund) (/unique_chucks/5/0x24dc97fb4fd3517fa82943b00a60b0fd3bcf0688.sol#771-772)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- participants (/unique_chucks/5/0x24dc97fb4fd3517fa82943b00a60b0fd3bcf0688.sol#786)
	- participants (/unique_chucks/5/0x24dc97fb4fd3517fa82943b00a60b0fd3bcf0688.sol#787)
	- totalSold (/unique_chucks/5/0x24dc97fb4fd3517fa82943b00a60b0fd3bcf0688.sol#789-790)

WithBonusPeriods.updateCurrentBonusPeriod (/unique_chucks/5/0x24dc97fb4fd3517fa82943b00a60b0fd3bcf0688.sol#217-238) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- bonusPeriods[i].fromTimestamp <= block.timestamp && bonusPeriods[i].toTimestamp >= block.timestamp (/unique_chucks/5/0x24dc97fb4fd3517fa82943b00a60b0fd3bcf0688.sol#227-238)
	- currentBonusPeriod.fromTimestamp <= block.timestamp && currentBonusPeriod.toTimestamp >= block.timestamp (/unique_chucks/5/0x24dc97fb4fd3517fa82943b00a60b0fd3bcf0688.sol#219-220)

BasicCrowdsale.start (/unique_chucks/5/0x24dc97fb4fd3517fa82943b00a60b0fd3bcf0688.sol#604-645) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- require(bool)(_startTimestamp >= block.timestamp) (/unique_chucks/5/0x24dc97fb4fd3517fa82943b00a60b0fd3bcf0688.sol#616)

BasicCrowdsale.isFailed (/unique_chucks/5/0x24dc97fb4fd3517fa82943b00a60b0fd3bcf0688.sol#647-661) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- (started && block.timestamp >= endTimestamp && totalCollected < minimalGoal) (/unique_chucks/5/0x24dc97fb4fd3517fa82943b00a60b0fd3bcf0688.sol#649-661)

BasicCrowdsale.isActive (/unique_chucks/5/0x24dc97fb4fd3517fa82943b00a60b0fd3bcf0688.sol#663-681) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- (started && totalCollected < hardCap && block.timestamp >= startTimestamp && block.timestamp < endTimestamp) (/unique_chucks/5/0x24dc97fb4fd3517fa82943b00a60b0fd3bcf0688.sol#664-681)

elements.expression: (started && totalCollected < hardCap && block.timestamp >= startTimestamp && block.timestamp < endTimestamp)

analysis.description:
BasicCrowdsale.isSuccessful (/unique_chucks/5/0x24dc97fb4fd3517fa82943b00a60b0fd3bcf0688.sol#682-691) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- (totalCollected >= hardCap || (block.timestamp >= endTimestamp && totalCollected >= minimalGoal)) (/unique_chucks/5/0x24dc97fb4fd3517fa82943b00a60b0fd3bcf0688.sol#685-691)
